short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,es,e: Ð¡onvenient picture-in-picture, compact PiP, seamless video overlay, and floating video player
short.en_GB: Easy-to-use picture-in-picture, lightweight PiP, smooth video overlay, and responsive floating video player
short.en_US: Accessible picture-in-picture, compact PiP mode, enhanced video overlay, and customizable floating video player

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,es,e:
Activate Picture-in-Picture to keep videos on top as you browse.
You can resize the video window and place it anywhere on your screen. It is always on top of other windows.

Enjoy videos while multitasking with our Picture-in-Picture feature.
It lets you watch your content without interrupting your work. Just click a button to minimize distractions and stay productive.

Switch to PIP mode for a floating video window that follows you.
You can move the window wherever you want while scrolling through your favourite websites. It's perfect for watching videos while working.

Enable Picture-in-Picture and keep your favourite videos always visible.
Even if you open a new tab, your video stays on top of all other content. You won't have to pause your tasks to keep watching.

Control your videos easily with a simple PIP mode.
You can play, pause, and skip without leaving your current page. Managing your videos is effortless, even while multitasking.

Experience seamless browsing with our Picture-in-Picture support.
You can follow your video while browsing other content. This feature is designed to ensure that your workflow is never interrupted.

Watch videos and work at the same time using Picture in Picture.
Drag the video window to any corner and keep working in the background. You stay productive without missing your favorite content.

Keep videos in view by turning on Picture-in-Picture mode.
It allows you to adjust the size of the floating video while browsing. You can work on multiple things while staying entertained.

Reduce distractions by using PIP for focused video viewing.
It keeps your video on screen, helping you avoid switching back and forth between tabs. Your content stays visible, while you remain efficient.

Enjoy continuous playback across tabs with Picture-in-Picture.
Your video stays playing no matter how many tabs you open. You can browse the web and keep up with what you're watching.
